page.title: 05LEISURE
page.content: The{Community Centre}, a kind of village hall,is used by lots of people in many different ways.The school and the playgroup use it 3 times a week each.A Mothers and Toddlers group use it weekly,as do the Sunday School and the Over 25 Badminton Club .The Health Visitor uses it for anti and post natal work fortnightly as do the W.I.The Drama Group put on two productions a year, a pantomime (Aladin) in the Autumn and a straight play (The Importance of Being Ernest) in the Spring.Many organisations use it for{dances,parties}and other {entertainments. A survey of families at the School showed that children used the Community Centre most regularly,about half of Mothers used it but only about a quarter of Fathers.
